IRLGE
AI Modelling - Creating Deals - Delivery

Parts of the business

About

IRLGE provides liquidity to online markets like Ebay, Facebook Marketplace, Gumtree and Cash Convertors. Based in Melbourne, we buy and sell: cars, games, books and clothes around Australia.

It is our goal to make buying and selling common second hand goods simpler.

Contact Us

Around the Web

Project 1

We find and advertise listings on a variety of platforms. Like Facebook marketplace, gumtree, cash convertors.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 2

We have proprietary language models, to understand what is being sold, and pricing models to evaluate new listings in real time. With our database of millions of listings we can study the supply and demand in different regions to find what to buy and sell.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 3

Once a potential listing has been identified, we are alerted right away to begin securing the deal either through direct messaging or a phone call.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 4

We have years of experience in both local delivery and postage. Our network of delivery drivers handle local pickup and drop off. We have also posted hundreds of items and know how to protect ourselves when things go wrong.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 6

There is a big value add that can come from simple repairs on items we commonly buy. We have common tools for car repairs and knowledge of how to repair the frequent issues arising from things we commonly buy.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 5

Currently, we are focused on our operations in Melbourne. However, we have already begun collecting data on listings in other states. Ultimately, we want to expand what we are doing globally.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development
